/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. A few cars and motorcycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in this part of the city. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, offering a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
